channel.title: Need some coding
channel.description:
Ok, i have searched the tuts section a million times and not found this stuff, if its there can sum1 post a link? if not then can sum1 post how to.
1. I need the Character apearance thing, to come on once when first loggin or sumthin, there was a tut but i did it, no errors but it didnt work.
2. I need a working ban code, i have the pls command of the testscape source but it doesnt work, and adding their name or ip to the files doesnt work.
3. An auto save that saves once every 5 minutes or sumthin
4. posiby a bat program that detects when the server is messed up and auto restarts the runserver file, or restarts it once every half hour, i think antilag.java is suposed to do this but it doesnt.
5. when u click the accept button on the char screen, it doesnt save and the tut was removed due to leechers or sumthin. so maybe sum1 can post it here or repost the tut?
6. i didnt look for this yet but if there is no tut already, how do i add objects? like were i add the code for em and were i get the object list,
this is alot i know but its all the stuff ive been needing since i started working with rs servers, witch was around the time moparisthebest.com shut down Ne help is greatly apriciated, ty and sorry for my horrible typing, my auto spell and grammer check broke :([br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 01:23:50 AM[/size][hr]Oh i just realized, Someone please tell me how to make npcs walk!! I added in the coords right and all, and they dont walk, ive tried a million times and they never seem to walk the only way ive gotten one to walk is by coping a monster near its coords

item.title: Need some coding
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

  1. im not a noob
  2. I wudnt have to ask so many questions if people wud just help me, ive asked these questions one by one multiple times and no1 every answeres me.
  3. the npcs wont walk, ive read the autospawn.cfg and asked the question b4, i put the right coords in and it doesnt work, ive used search a million times and half the tuts or watever i need is shud down due to leechers or sum otehr shit.
  4. ban user does not work in my source, ive banned 10 people and they keep signing right back on, and i added the ips to the bannedusers.dat file and to anotehr ban file that i made on my own and it doesnt work right.
  5. just walkign a step does not save the char appearance, because the char window does not change it on my server, i need the code that makes it work right.
  6. be happy i didnt post #6 cause chances are it wudda made u cry to ur mom

Read full topic

item.title: Need some coding
item.dc:creator: @PKOwner PKOwner
item.description:
@PKOwner wrote:

Npc Walk read ur autospawn and experiment
For char appearance it WORKS just walk and it will change
use ::banuser -.-
and ur asking for too much gd stuff
also use SEARCH BUTTON!
and add the ip in the bannedip.txt if it doesnt work ur a real noobâ€¦

Read full topic
